Name: Imran Tahir
Teams: South Africa, Warwickshire, Hampshire, Duronto Rajshahi, Lions, Delhi Capitals, Dolphins, Nottinghamshire, Mumbai Cricket Association XI, Rising Pune Supergiant, Derbyshire, World XI, Nelson Mandela Bay Stars, Chennai Super Kings, Multan Sultans, Guyana Amazon Warriors, Durham, Nelson Mandela Bay Giants, Surrey, Amsterdam Knights, Melbourne Renegades, Deccan Gladiators, Birmingham Phoenix
Bio: Imran Tahir moved from Pakistan to South Africa via the UK for the love of a woman,he played for more than 25 teams,including four English counties,three South African franchises  an IPL team while carving a reputation as one of the best limited-overs' legspinners of his time,A feisty character with a celebration longer than most fast-bowlers' run-ups  a range of variations,Tahir made the googly his biggest weapon in the limited-overs formats
